cards.buttonText: Click Here To Access The Livestream

sections: will be hosting its first ever election night livestream! David Sirota and the entire stable of
reporters will be broadcasting live on Callin as the midterm election results roll in. They’ll also be taking questions from the audience LIVE on-air!

’s reporters will be offering their analysis on everything, from the races that could determine which party will control Congress, to what voters are saying in exit polls, to how corporate media is spinning the results. Join us on election night as we learn the results along with the audience (while hopefully not going too crazy).
A transcript will be available on this episode’s Callin page after it is published. For more detailed instructions on how to use Callin, go
If you enjoy this live show, feel free to pitch into the tip jar — it helps us do this kind of reporting:
We hope you enjoy our weekly podcasts — it’s the next step in our plan to build a powerful independent voice to take on corporate media.
